MSG_ORDER_ALREADY_COD: Order is already in Cash on Delivery
MSG_AUTH_ACCOUNT_BLOCKED_BY_ADMIN: Your account is blocked. Please contact support.
MSG_AUTH_MOBILE_ALREADY: Mobile number has already been registered
MSG_AUTH_NO_ACCOUNT_FOUND: Sorry, we couldn't find an account with that email or mobile
MSG_CANNOT_SAME_OPEN_CLOSE: Open and close time cannot be same
MSG_CART_ADDRESS_NOT_AVAILABLE: Address you have selected is not available now
MSG_CART_PRODUCT_UNAVAILABLE: Some products are out of stock now
MSG_SLOT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Delivery time you have selected is not available now. Please select a different delivery time
MSG_CONFIRM_CANCEL: Are you sure you want to cancel this?
MSG_COUPON_NOT_APPLICABLE: Invalid Coupon. Code not applicable on your cart items.
MSG_DELIVERY_LOCATION_NOT_AVAILABLE: Delivery is not available on your location
MSG_DETETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this?
MSG_ENDDATE_GREATER_STARTDATE: End date should be greater than start date
MSG_EXPORT_STARTED: Product export started. We will notify once it will complete
MSG_IMPORT_FILE_TYPE_ERROR: Import file type is invalid. We accept excel file only
MSG_IMPORT_STARTED: Product import started. We will notify once it will complete
MSG_INVALID_COUPON_CODE: Invalid Coupon. Code does not exist.
MSG_INVALID_MINUTE_RANGE: Invalid minutes. it should be in 30 minutes format
MSG_INVALID_TIME_RANGE: Time must be in minutes. It should be in 0-1440 range
MSG_PERCENTAGE_LESS_100: Percentage value must be less than 100
MSG_ORDER_CANNOT_DELETE: Only pending status can be deleted
MSG_USER_CANNOT_DELETE: The user has orders linked. Cannot be deleted

AARIVO
TEMPLATE_MOBILE_VERIFY_OTP_MSG: Dear {{firstName}}, Use this OTP {{otp}} to verify your mobile number. Regards, AARIVO
MSG_CUSTOMER_ORDER_ON_THE_WAY_DESC: Your order #{{orderId}} is on the way
MSG_INSUFFICIENT_WALLET_BALANCE: You have insufficient wallet balance. Please re-apply wallet.
